action.text: Amendment SA 1031 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1031 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 94.
Point of order that the amendment violates section 313(b)(1)(D) of the CBA raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 1031.
Amendment SA 1031 proposed by Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1247; text: CR S1295-1300) To improve the bill.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive all applicable budgetary discipline with respect to amendment SA 1031 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 52 - 47. Record Vote Number: 94.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1031 proposed by Senator Lankford to Amendment SA 891.
